# init(progressViewStyle:)

**Initializer**

Creates a progress view with the specified style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(progressViewStyle style: UIProgressView.Style)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: A constant that specifies the style of the object to be created. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/Style] for descriptions of the style constants.

## Return Value

An initialized [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView] object.

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView] sets the height of the returned view according to the specified `style`. You can set and retrieve the style of a progress view through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/progressViewStyle] property.

## Creating a progress view

- **init(frame:)**: Creates a progress view with the specified frame rectangle.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a progress view from data in an unarchiver.
